UpdateSourceArgs: -c 'cd smalland && wget -q -O SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip "https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/npnfynj1de24gmid2b4v6/h/SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip?rlkey=5yqehd802qy0hbsmvl59zdlme&dl=0" && unzip SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux.zip && mv -f SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux/* 808040/ && rm -rf SMALLANDDedicatedServer_Linux* && chmod +x 808040/SMALLAND/Binaries/Linux/SMALLANDServer-Linux-Shipping'

/C cd smalland && curl -o SMALLANDDedicatedServer.zip -L "https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/npnfynj1de24gmid2b4v6/h/SMALLANDDedicatedServer.zip?rlkey=5yqehd802qy0hbsmvl59zdlme&dl=0" && tar -xvf SMALLANDDedicatedServer.zip && move /Y SMALLANDDedicatedServer\* 808040\ && rd /S /Q SMALLANDDedicatedServer && del /Q SMALLANDDedicatedServer.zip
